title: Moonlight Betrayal
description:
Love hurts. It can even kill.
Love and loss, mistakes and misunderstandings, a ballgame, a bed and breakfast, and a battle between former best friends, a showdown of ancient enemies, a struggle for life, a plea for forgiveness… And we’ve only just reached Yorkshire.
This is Book 5 in The Witch and the Wolf Pack series.
author: K.R. Alexander
